abstract: United Technologies, the diversified U.S. manufacturer, is now the favorite in the bidding for General Electric‘s security business, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: United Technologies, the diversified U.S. manufacturer, is now the favorite in the bidding for General Electric‘s security business, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: United Technologies, the diversified manufacturer, is now the favorite in the bidding for General Electric‘s security business, Bloomberg News reported, citing a person familiar with the matter.

headline.main: United Technologies Said to Be Favored for G.E. Unit
